translation.en: -Joel. -Shh. No words, my love.
I'm sorry, babe, I'm just not really a "pound one out" kind of gal.
translation.it: Tesoro, scusami, ma non sono il tipo da una sveltina e via.

translation.en: I know, and that's great.
You like romance and lavender candles
and a massage with essential oils and a wonderful meal but not too heavy.
translation.it: i massaggi con oli essenziali e una buona cena, leggera.

translation.en: You're making fun of me.
No. I'm only saying that sometimes, maybe even now,
translation.it: No. Dico che a volte, come adesso magari,

translation.en: -we might try... -Humping?
Like that rescue dog did to that little girl at the Rite Aid?
translation.it: Come quel cane provava a fare con la bambina in farmacia?

translation.en: [woman] Jennifer Lawrence chopped off her hair again.
translation.it: Jennifer Lawrence si è tagliata ancora i capelli.

translation.en: Everybody hates it like that but she doesn't care.
translation.it: Non piace a nessuno così, ma a lei non importa.

translation.en: She's so bold.
I wish I was bold.
Am I bold? No, I'm not.
translation.it: Sono audace? No, non lo sono.

translation.en: I'm really upset about the new toaster oven.
I'd like to be 20 percent bolder.
translation.it: Vorrei avere un 20% in più di audacia.

translation.en: No, more, 80 percent. No, that's too much.
translation.it: Anzi, un 80%. No, forse così è troppo.

translation.en: Look at all the slack in these knobs.
translation.it: La manopola della temperatura è molle.

translation.en: You can't set an accurate temperature.
Yeah, I know, honey. Did you send them an e-mail?
translation.it: Lo so. Gli hai più inviato quell'email?

translation.en: No, I re-read it. It came across a little crazy.
translation.it: No, l'ho riletta, risultava leggermente folle.

translation.en: I need a car.
I can't live here anymore without a car. We're in the middle of freaking nowhere.
translation.it: Non posso più vivere in mezzo al nulla senza un'auto.

translation.en: -We're not buying you a car. -You don't need to buy me a car.
translation.it: - Non te la compriamo. - Non comprarla a me,

translation.en: Buy Mom a new car, I'll take hers. Like a normal family.
translation.it: ma alla mamma e io prendo la sua.

translation.en: -I like the Range Rover. -Ah.
You'd look good in that.
Why don't you love Mom enough to buy her a Range Rover?
translation.it: Non la ami abbastanza da comprargliela?

translation.en: What? What is it? Are you all right?
Yeah, I just have this, like, sharp... [groans]
Here, sit down.
Is Mom dying?
-Stop it. -I don't know, parents die.
I'm not dying, honey. I probably just ate something.
translation.it: Non sto morendo, sarà qualcosa che ho mangiato.

translation.en: [sharp breath] I'm fine. See? All better.
-Are you sure? You scared me. -Yeah, me too.
Makes you think... life is short.
translation.it: Ti rendi conto che la vita è breve.

translation.en: You're not getting a car.
Maybe we can hang out after school.
translation.it: Perché non facciamo qualcosa dopo la scuola?

translation.en: Go to the Tea Garden together.
Why?
Because I love you and I don't see you very much.
translation.it: Perché ti voglio bene e non ci vediamo spesso.

translation.en: -I think this is working. -[car trunk opens]
-Joel. -Dan.
Noticed a light on in your den all night.
translation.it: Hai tenuto la luce in camera accesa tutta notte.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Someone's gonna get in trouble. [chuckles]
Just kidding, no one's in trouble.
-Unusual, that's all. -Dan.
-I had trouble sleeping, so I was up. -You had trouble sleeping?
translation.it: - Non riuscivo a dormire. - Non riuscivi a dormire?

translation.en: -Problem? -Dan, leave people alone.
translation.it: - Come mai? - Dan, lascia in pace la gente.

translation.en: -Cop brain, sorry. -I'm not a cop, baby. -LA Sheriff's Department, all the way. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: - Roba da poliziotto, scusate. - No, tesoro, Dipartimento dello sceriffo.

translation.en: Dickless over there is a cop. Morning, puss.
translation.it: Quello smidollato è un poliziotto. Buongiorno, femminuccia.

translation.en: Another day in pretend law enforcement?
translation.it: Un altro giorno di duro lavoro?

translation.en: Have a good day, Dan. Be safe.
Santa Monica PD. Shitbirds. [scoffs]
translation.it: Dipartimento di polizia di Santa Monica, dei pivelli.

translation.en: Be careful today chasing bad guys, honey bunch.
translation.it: Sta' attento oggi a inseguire i cattivi, caro.

translation.en: Oh, that's right, they don't allow pursuits in Santa Monica.
translation.it: Hai ragione, non ve lo permettono a Santa Monica.

translation.en: Worried it might hurt somebody's feelings.
-Just trying not to kill civilians, Dan. -[baby coos]
translation.it: Cerchiamo solo di non uccidere i civili, Dan.

translation.en: We protect and serve, not frame and maim like the sheriff's department.
translation.it: Noi proteggiamo la gente, non la mutiliamo come voi.

translation.en: -Suck me, Rick. -[chuckles]
Why do we gotta live between two cops?
translation.it: Perché dobbiamo vivere tra due poliziotti?

translation.en: Why couldn't it be two rival pastry chefs?
translation.it: Non potevano essere due pasticceri rivali?

translation.en: -I don't know. -See you at the Petersons'.
translation.it: - Che ne so. - Ci vediamo dai Peterson.

translation.en: Do you have everything you need?
-[Abby] Yes, Mom. -I'm just checking.
translation.it: - Sì, mamma. - Era solo per essere sicura.

translation.en: -Bye, Dad. -Bye, honey.
-You look so pretty today. -[chuckles]
Eric worships you. You're the queen of his spank bank.
translation.it: Eric ti adora. Sei la regina delle sue fantasie.

translation.en: Mom, please!
Hey, some of us girls are going out tonight.
Drinking, dancing, etcetera. You wanna come?
translation.it: Si beve, si balla, eccetera. Vieni?

translation.en: No, I can't, um, tonight.
-But thank you. -You're so flustered.
We're not banging dudes.
At least that's what we tell our husbands.
translation.it: O almeno è quello che diciamo ai maritini.

translation.en: You're funny. Have a nice day.
Sheila Hammond, say hello to Gary West.
Gary was rocking it up in Sacramento. Now he's all ours.
translation.it: Era il numero uno a Sacramento e ora è tutto nostro.

translation.en: -Hi, Gary. Uh, welcome aboard. -Thank you, Sheila.
I'm very excited to be here.
Sheila works with her husband. She's the pretty one.
translation.it: Lavora con suo marito, lei è quella carina.

translation.en: You two gonna sell the Peterson house today?
translation.it: Oggi venderete la casa dei Peterson?

translation.en: We're gonna try, Carl.
None of this "try" bullshit. Do it!
Oh, you're yelling at me.
The Petersons are nervous. We cannot lose this goddamn listing.
translation.it: I Peterson sono nervosi. Non possiamo perderli, maledizione!

translation.en: Well, this is the third time these buyers have been at the house.
translation.it: È la terza volta che vedono la casa.

translation.en: -Get an offer! -Mm-hmm.
Get an offer.
-That's what realtors do. -Okay.
Come on, I'll show you your office. It's small.
translation.it: Ti mostro il tuo ufficio, è un po' piccolo.

translation.en: It's nice meeting you. I'm so sorry you got yelled at.
translation.it: È stato un piacere, mi spiace che abbia urlato.

translation.en: Same. I mean, nice meeting you, not sorry I got yelled at.
translation.it: Idem, che è stato un piacere, non che mi spiace che abbia urlato.

translation.en: -Well, actually both. -[laughs]
The master has been completely remodeled.
Lots of light and brand-new textured plush carpeting.
translation.it: È molto luminosa e con una soffice moquette nuova di zecca.

translation.en: -All headed in the same direction. -[all chuckle]
It's just lovely.
Do you know what my favorite thing about the upstairs is?
translation.it: Sapete cosa preferisco del piano di sopra?

translation.en: -The laundry chute. -Oh, it's amazing.
It was so--
-[muffled gasp] -Oh, my God.
[Joel] Honey, you okay?
I'm sorry. We are gonna call a crew and immediately get that cleaned up.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Chiamiamo subito un'impresa di pulizie.

translation.en: Maybe we should reschedule.
Great idea. I could run you up to that Cape Cod on Barnhill.
translation.it: Ottima idea. Posso mostrarvi la casa in stile Cape Cod sulla Barnhill.

translation.en: No, please. I don't wanna make everyone have to come back.
translation.it: No, vi prego, non voglio farvi ritornare.

translation.en: I'm just gonna go use the restroom really quickly,
and call the cleaning crew.
I'll be right back, excuse me.
-Okay, other bedrooms. -Yes, this way.
translation.it: - Le altre camere da letto. - Di qui.

translation.en: New skylights really open it up, don't you think?
translation.it: Il lucernario la rende più ampia, vero?

translation.en: -I love the crown molding in here. -Mmm.
-Just beautiful. -Yeah.
I wanna leave.
Sheila.
-[knocking] -Sheila-- Oh, my God.
Oh, my God, Sheila.
Sheila. Sheila? Sheila.
Oh, God.
Oh, God.
Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
Oh! Sheila.
-Did we get the offer? -[gasps] Oh, what the fuck?
translation.it: - Hanno fatto un'offerta? - Ma che cazzo?

translation.en: I'm okay.
I just threw up.
Like a fair amount.
Yeah.
And that came out of me.
translation.it: E quella è uscita da me.

translation.en: Do you think it's an organ?
I really am feeling better, honey.
I wanna get you looked at.
[sighs] We've been here over three hours.
translation.it: Siamo qui da più di tre ore.

translation.en: I just wanna go home, get out of these clothes and take a bath.
translation.it: Voglio andare a casa, togliermi i vestiti e fare un bagno.

translation.en: I feel like a bus station shit in my mouth.
translation.it: La mia bocca sembra il cesso di una stazione.

translation.en: [pats his thigh] I'll go see what's happening.
Excuse me.
Do not ask me again how long it's gonna be.
translation.it: Non mi chieda ancora quanto ci vuole.

translation.en: This isn't a deli counter.
The most life-threatening conditions have priority. Your wife threw up.
translation.it: I casi di codice rosso hanno la priorità, sua moglie ha vomitato.

translation.en: -A lot. -Your wife threw up.
-A lot. -Okay, we're not doing this.
Gonna call your doctor and make you some soup. You lost a lot of fluids.
translation.it: Ti faccio un brodino. Hai perso tanti liquidi.

translation.en: I'm okay with you smoking pot.
Excuse me?
I know I complain about it so you try to hide it,
translation.it: So che me lo nascondi perché non mi piace,

translation.en: but I just want you to be the Joel you want to be.
translation.it: ma voglio che tu sia te stesso.

translation.en: -That's really nice, sweetheart. -[door opens]
-Sheila. -Gary.
This is Gary, the new realtor I was telling you about.
translation.it: Lui è il nuovo collega di cui ti parlavo.

translation.en: Gary, my husband, Joel.
-Hey, Gary. -Hi there.
So how are you feeling? I heard about your afternoon.
translation.it: Come ti senti? Ho saputo di oggi pomeriggio.

translation.en: -Much better, thank you. -Oh, these are for you.
translation.it: - Molto meglio, grazie. - Sono per te.

translation.en: And I made sure the cleaning crew got in there okay.
translation.it: Ho pensato io all'impresa di pulizie.

translation.en: They took care of everything so don't worry about that.
-Thank you, Gary. That is so sweet. -So sweet.
Well, we'd invite you in, but--
Don't even think about it. But listen-- Joel, can I talk to you a moment?
translation.it: Ci mancherebbe. Joel, posso parlarti un attimo?

translation.en: I'm gonna go get cleaned up.
Thanks for the flowers, Gar, and all your help.
translation.it: Grazie per i fiori e per l'aiuto.

translation.en: No problem.
Feel better.
That was a crazy amount of vomit.
translation.it: Era una quantità pazzesca di vomito.

translation.en: Well, I'm not a medical expert, so I can't say what the proper amount of vomit is.
translation.it: Non sono un medico, non so quale sia la giusta quantità.

translation.en: -It was a huge amount. -Are you a doctor, Gary?
translation.it: - Era una quantità enorme. - Sei un medico?

translation.en: -No. -Neither am I.
So let's not dishonor that profession, which takes eight years of intense training,
translation.it: Non disonoriamo la professione, che implica otto duri anni di studio,

translation.en: by thinking we can give medical opinions, okay?
Fine, then let's just stick to facts.
The homeowners came by, they didn't like what they saw.
So they don't want to work with you anymore. They'll be working with me now.
translation.it: Così non vogliono più te, lavoreranno con me d'ora in poi.

translation.en: You're stealing our listing?
No, the facts are they fired you, then hired me.
translation.it: No, ti hanno licenziato e hanno assunto me.

translation.en: And that was an insane amount of vomit.
translation.it: E comunque era una quantità assurda di vomito.

translation.en: Everything's good. Gary just needed some advice.
translation.it: Tutto a posto, voleva dei consigli.

translation.en: I helped him out.
I can't feel my heartbeat.
-What? -My heart.
I can't feel it.
[sighs] I love your hair.
Yeah. Like that.
Bingo. [exhales]
-Can I help you? -What?
My manager noticed that you've been staring at the stethoscopes
translation.it: Il mio capo ha notato che sta fissando gli stetoscopi

translation.en: for, like, a really long time.
There's something happening with my wife.
translation.it: Sta succedendo qualcosa a mia moglie.

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm only 20, so...
Right. Sorry.
Do you know the difference between the dual-headed stethoscopes and the single-headed ones?
translation.it: Che differenza c'è tra gli stetoscopi a testa doppia e singola?

translation.en: Well, dual would be two.
translation.it: A testa doppia, ne ha due.

translation.en: I see. So twice as many then.
It's not just a physical thing, she's acting different.
translation.it: Non è solo un problema fisico, si comporta diversamente.

translation.en: I'm gonna get this one.
It doesn't make sense.
My jaw still kinda hurts.
translation.it: Mi fa ancora male la mandibola.

translation.en: Then stop talking.
I don't hear anything.
-[Joel] I know, right? -There's something else.
But no one freak out because I feel fine.
translation.it: Ma non spaventatevi, io mi sento bene.

translation.en: Look. No blood.
Still, no one freak out.
Oh, shit.
-[Sheila] Is the juice helping? -Uh-huh. Yep.
translation.it: - Va meglio con il succo? - Sì.

translation.en: [Joel] I can cook that meat for you, sweetheart. I'm fine.
translation.it: - Posso cuocerti quella carne, se vuoi. - Va bene così.

translation.en: -We should go back to the emergency room. -No.
I'm sorry.
Look, I know things are very wrong but I feel good.
translation.it: So che sembra tutto strano, ma sto bene.

translation.en: I have all this energy and, like, a focus.
translation.it: Sono piena di energia e concentrazione.

translation.en: I can't go to a hospital where they're gonna put me in a tube and prick me and poke me.
translation.it: Non voglio andare in ospedale, mi riempirebbero di tubi e punture.

translation.en: They might never let me come home again.
translation.it: Magari non mi lascerebbero più uscire.

translation.en: Bad for you because we're having spectacular sex.
translation.it: Sarebbe peggio per te, perché il sesso sta andando alla grande.

translation.en: Whatever this is, we need to talk to someone because we are not experts.
translation.it: Dobbiamo parlarne con qualcuno perché non siamo degli esperti.

translation.en: And this is just the sort of thing the Internet will have a lot of misinformation about.
translation.it: E su Internet troveremmo solo informazioni sbagliate.

translation.en: -[Abby] I know someone. -Who?
-A creeper. -What's a creeper?
The kind of a nerd who specializes in disturbing, weird or gruesome shit.
translation.it: Un nerd esperto di roba disgustosa, strana, orribile.

translation.en: No pupillary response. Have you noticed any deteriorating flesh?
translation.it: Nessuna risposta pupillare. Carne in decomposizione?

translation.en: -No? -Blackening of the skin,
digits or other pieces falling off? -No. -Okay.
translation.it: - dita o altri pezzi staccati? - No.

translation.en: -Um, have you eaten anyone? -No.
-But I may have thrown up an organ. -No worries.
translation.it: - Ma forse ho vomitato un organo. - Tranquilla.

translation.en: -[slurring] Hello. -We already said hello.
From when you came in.
I haven't had this many people in my room before.
translation.it: Non c'è mai stata tanta gente qui.

translation.en: -You're doing fine. -Thank you.
Do you guys want chairs?
-We just want to know what's going on. -Right.
translation.it: - Vogliamo solo sapere che succede. - Giusto.

translation.en: Well... she is dead...
-and also undead. -What the fuck?
translation.it: - ma anche non morta. - Che cazzo dici?

translation.en: I'm sorry. What are you saying?
She's a... zombie?
I don't like that word, I think it's inherently negative.
-I don't like it either. -Let's not use it.
I don't feel dead and undead.
translation.it: Non mi sento morta e non morta.

translation.en: I feel the opposite. Totally alive.
She's been very...
-exuberant. -Exuberant?
Yeah, they're doing it a lot.
Well, one thing we know about the undead is they're completely driven by their id.
translation.it: Ciò che sappiamo dei non morti è che sono dominati dall'Es.

translation.en: The id is a part of the brain that demands us to satisfy our desires.
translation.it: La parte di noi che vuole soddisfare i desideri.

translation.en: -I know what the id is. -It just...
-wants whatever it wants. -I sit behind you in Psych.
translation.it: - So cos'è l'Es. - È... incontrollabile. - Sono seduta dietro di te a Psicologia. - Sì.

translation.en: -I know. -How could this happen?
We're realtors.
Well, most new viruses come from animals, like monkeys or bats.
translation.it: Molti nuovi virus vengono dagli animali, come scimmie o pipistrelli.

translation.en: As humans destroy their habitats, we're exposed to all kinds of unfamiliar diseases.
translation.it: Gli umani distruggono il loro habitat e possono contrarre malattie strane.

translation.en: I mean, we're the real so-called zombies, aren't we?
Consuming everything we want without any regard for consequences.
translation.it: Consumiamo di tutto, senza pensare alle conseguenze.

translation.en: As we destroy the Earth so, too, do we destroy ourselves.
translation.it: E distruggendo la Terra, distruggiamo noi stessi.

translation.en: So, then, a bat or a monkey?
translation.it: Quindi un pipistrello o una scimmia?

translation.en: Maybe.
Anything else we should know? Not that we know anything.
translation.it: Dovremmo sapere altro? Non che sappiamo qualcosa.

translation.en: Always keep her fed.
I'm pretty sure we don't want to find out what happens when she's hungry.
translation.it: Meglio non scoprire cosa succede se ha fame.

translation.en: And if she starts to show more symptoms, like, uh, deterioration or aggression,
translation.it: E se mostra altri sintomi, quali deterioramento o aggressività,

translation.en: you may have to...
What?
Bash her brains in.
We're realtors.
Okay, until we know more, we cannot tell anyone about this, especially your mother.
translation.it: Per ora lo terremo nascosto, soprattutto a tua madre.

translation.en: Although it is hard to imagine how she'd blow this out of proportion.
What a beautiful afternoon.
[gasps] We should do something.
-Let's buy a Range Rover. -Fuck yeah.
translation.it: - Compriamo una Range Rover. - Sì, cazzo.

translation.en: We are going home and coming up with a plan.
translation.it: Andiamo a casa e pensiamo a un piano.

translation.en: We need answers.
How'd this happen? How do we fix it?
-Has it affected anyone else? -Ooh!
Look what I found.
-Don't eat a snail. -[Abby] Oh...
-Crunchy. -Okay.
Oh, crap.
Hey, Dan. How was work?
translation.it: Ciao, Dan. Com'è andata al lavoro?

translation.en: -Lisa home? -[Joel] No, no.
Should be soon, though, I'm guessing.
-Yeah, I don't know her schedule. -What are you all doing here?
translation.it: - Non so i suoi orari. - Che ci fate qui?

translation.en: What are you all doing here?
That's funny.
-We were just talking to Eric. -Eric? Why?
Because... we found a football in our backyard, we thought it might be his.
translation.it: Perché avevamo trovato una palla in giardino e pensavamo fosse sua.

translation.en: Eric doesn't own a football or anything else that would make him come outside.
translation.it: Eric non ha palle, né niente per cui debba uscire di casa.

translation.en: That's exactly what he said, only with less implied criticism, so...
translation.it: È quello che ha detto lui, senza la critica implicita.

translation.en: mystery not solved.
Then, uh, where's the football?
-Run. -Mm-hmm.
-Don't shoot! Don't shoot! -Shoot her! Shoot her!
We threw it back over the fence.
So, as you would say, "case closed."
translation.it: Quindi, come diresti tu, il caso è chiuso.

translation.en: "Shoot her, shoot her." Really?
You would be a terrible partner in a crime spree.
Uh, it's called self-preservation.
And it's an instinct you should be happy I have.
translation.it: Dovresti essere felice che io ce l'abbia.

translation.en: That is exactly what we don't want.
translation.it: Questo è proprio ciò che non vogliamo.

translation.en: Now Dan is suspicious.
-What if he asks Eric about it? -Eric won't say anything.
translation.it: - E se interroga Eric? - Non parlerà.

translation.en: -How do you know? -Because Eric hates his stepdad.
translation.it: - Come lo sai? - Perché Eric odia il suo patrigno.

translation.en: That's sad, I feel bad Eric has a crappy stepdad.
translation.it: Mi dispiace che Eric abbia un padrigno del cavolo.

translation.en: Maybe we should adopt Eric.
Out of the question.
Look, you need to fight this a little. Be a little less impulsive.
translation.it: Cerca di sforzarti un po' ed essere meno impulsiva.

translation.en: I'm hungry.
And there's no hamburger left.
translation.it: E non ci sono più hamburger.

translation.en: I'll go get you some food, but then we're coming up with a plan.
translation.it: Ti diamo da mangiare, ma poi troviamo un piano.

translation.en: -Keep her here. -All right.
-I'm serious, don't go anywhere. -All right.
You should slow down. I need you to slow down. Please slow down.
Faster, faster, faster!
I got organic, I don't know if that's still important.
translation.it: È tutto biologico, non so se t'interessa ancora.

translation.en: Oh. What happened to your hair?
Where's your mom?
I'm glad you finally decided to join us.
translation.it: Sono felice che finalmente tu sia qui!

translation.en: This is fantastic.
From now on, always include me in everything.
translation.it: D'ora in poi coinvolgetemi in tutto ciò che fate.

translation.en: I can't believe you just went out and bought yourself a Range Rover.
translation.it: Non posso credere che hai appena comprato una Range Rover.

translation.en: I've been wanting one ever since this morning.
translation.it: Era da stamattina che ne volevo una.

translation.en: I think it's great. You're my new role model.
Yeah, if we want something, we should have it, damn it.
End of story.
I'm gonna get some of those Christian Louboutins.
They're fucking expensive, but fuck it.
translation.it: Sono carissime, ma chi cazzo se ne frega!

translation.en: There's a cute guy at the bar looking at you.
translation.it: Al bancone c'è uno carino che ti guarda.

translation.en: Oh, hello, he is cute. Do you know him?
translation.it: Salve... è proprio carino, lo conosci?

translation.en: Oh. His name is Gary. He just moved here.
translation.it: Si chiama Gary e si è appena trasferito.

translation.en: You like him. Are you two gonna bone?
-Lisa. -What?
We decided we shouldn't deny ourselves things,
translation.it: Abbiamo detto di non negarci le cose,

translation.en: and boning is a thing.
translation.it: e trombare è una di quelle.

translation.en: Sheila, let's go home.
-No, honey, I don't want to. -Yeah.
Come on, let's dance.
Sweetheart, you bought a car, and now you're grinding on the neighbors,
translation.it: Tesoro, hai comprato un'auto e adesso ti strusci sulle vicine.

translation.en: and this is not who you are.
Maybe it is.
Maybe it's who I've always wanted to be.
translation.it: Forse è quello che ho sempre voluto essere.

translation.en: Maybe it's not who you are.
-Honey. -Is there a problem?
Oh, God, not you.
Look, Joel, obviously you're upset, but if Sheila doesn't wanna go with you--
translation.it: Sei arrabbiato, ma se Sheila non vuole...

translation.en: Shut up, Gary.
-Sheila-- -Life should be fun, honey.
And I don't care what Consumer Reports says, that car is hot.
translation.it: E chi se ne frega di cosa dice Consumer Reports, è un'auto sexy.

translation.en: She wants to have fun, Joel.
And doesn't care what Consumer Reports says. I heard her, Gary.
translation.it: E non le importa di cosa dice Consumer Reports, ho sentito.

translation.en: -Sheila? -Then maybe you should go.
You know, 15 years ago, I would have punched you, once.
translation.it: Sai, 15 anni fa ti avrei tirato un pugno.

translation.en: I might have dropped you. If not, you would have beaten the hell out of me,
translation.it: Ti avrei buttato a terra, oppure tu mi avresti pestato,

translation.en: 'cause I just had the one move, and you're a substantial man.
translation.it: perché sei un uomo bello... sostanzioso.

translation.en: But now I have a family, a career, a life.
translation.it: Ma ora ho una famiglia, un lavoro, una vita.

translation.en: I'm not gonna be the guy who gets into bar fights.
translation.it: Non sono il tipo da rissa nei bar.

translation.en: -You mean loses bar fights. -You're missing my point.
translation.it: - Sei il tipo che le perde le risse. - Non hai capito.

translation.en: You don't wanna get into a fight because you're afraid you might lose.
translation.it: Non vuoi fare a pugni per paura di perdere.

translation.en: That is exactly wrong.
-The losing is a given. -Damn straight.
-And it's irrelevant. -You mean inevitable.
Goddamn it, you're frustrating.
At this point in my life,
translation.it: A questo punto della mia vita,

translation.en: -I'm not gonna be the kind of person-- -Who wins a bar fight.
translation.it: - non sono il tipo... - Che vince una lotta.

translation.en: -God fuck, what's the matter with you? -You are.
translation.it: - Ma cazzo, qual è il tuo problema? - Tu.

translation.en: I'm trying to explain a very simple concept.
translation.it: Ti sto spiegando un concetto semplice.

translation.en: You are.
I'm just gonna call this a draw and go home.
translation.it: Consideriamolo un pareggio, vado a casa.

translation.en: Have fun.
Joel, come back.
Hey, I'm sorry for butting in. I just don't like seeing a woman treated badly.
translation.it: Scusa se mi sono intromesso, non mi piace che trattino male le donne.

translation.en: -It's not gonna work. -No? Really? How about this?
translation.it: - Non funziona. - Davvero? E cosa dici di questo?

translation.en: Oh, my.
You happy now, big man?
You are.
My manager noticed that you've been staring at the toaster ovens for, like, a really long-- Oh, it's you.
translation.it: Il mio capo ha notato che fissa i forni da... ancora lei.

translation.en: Hey, do you know which one of these has a knob without any slack?
translation.it: Sai quale di questi ha una manopola precisa?

translation.en: No. Does it matter?
[sighs] I thought so.
I really did, but maybe it doesn't.
translation.it: Lo credevo davvero, ma forse non lo è.

translation.en: Maybe I shouldn't care about toaster knobs,
translation.it: Forse dovrei fregarmene di queste manopole

translation.en: or being responsible, or descending into chaos.
translation.it: o di essere responsabile o di sprofondare nel caos.

translation.en: Why should I be the only one in my family who gives a crap, right?
translation.it: Perché essere l'unico in famiglia a cui frega qualcosa?

translation.en: Who sucks it up?
This one's cheaper.
Maybe I want to have fun, drive a fancy car,
translation.it: Magari voglio divertirmi, guidare una bella macchina,

translation.en: dance like a sex lunatic, hmm?
-You're a good dancer. -You're missing the point, Ramona.
I don't want to dance.
And I don't want another shitty toaster oven.
translation.it: E non voglio un altro forno tostapane di merda.

translation.en: I'm outta here.
Hi.
I rang the bell then I saw your car in the driveway, so...
translation.it: Ho citofonato, poi ho visto la tua macchina nel vialetto.

translation.en: I'm just gardening. It relaxes me.
What's up?
I just wanted to make sure you were all right. Because I didn't wanna have sex with you last night?
translation.it: - Volevo assicurarmi che stessi bene. - Perché non ho voluto fare sesso con te?

translation.en: I'm fine.
We were in the middle of dancing and then you just strolled off.
translation.it: Stavamo ballando e sei andata via all'improvviso.

translation.en: I had a lot on my mind.
I ended up walking around all night.
Checked out a Dumpster behind Chili's.
They throw away a lot of raw meat.
translation.it: Buttano via un sacco di carne cruda.

translation.en: -How about we start over? -I don't think so.
-Are you sure? -I am.
Are you?
I feel like whatever I say
is just going to mean you push harder against my vagina.
translation.it: continuerai a spingere sempre più forte contro la mia vagina.

translation.en: Okay, I was right.
-Listen, Gary-- -Shh...
How about this?
We have some fun. You said you're all about fun.
translation.it: Ci divertiamo un po', che è quello che tu vuoi,

translation.en: And I don't say anything to your lame husband.
translation.it: e io non dirò niente al tuo moscio maritino, oppure no,

translation.en: Or we don't, and I tell him we screwed four times last night in my beamer.
translation.it: e io non dirò niente al tuo moscio maritino, oppure no, e gli dirò che stanotte abbiamo scopato quattro volte.

translation.en: Your unwillingness to take no for an answer
translation.it: La tua contrarietà ad accettare il mio rifiuto

translation.en: has made me feel sexy and desirable.
translation.it: La tua contrarietà ad accettare il mio rifiuto mi fa sentire sexy e attraente.

translation.en: I know, weirdest foreplay ever.
translation.it: Sì, lo so, sono i preliminari più strani di sempre.

translation.en: You ate my fingers.
-I do not hate your fingers. -"Ate," ate my fingers.
translation.it: - Non ti ho stancato le dita. - "Staccato" le dita.

translation.en: Sheila?
Sheila, we need to talk. Last night was bullshit.
translation.it: Dobbiamo parlare. Ieri sera mi sono girate le palle.

translation.en: Oh, Joel.
I really want to make this work.
translation.it: Voglio davvero far funzionare le cose.
